revision.text: {{ArticleHistory |action1=GAN |action1date=18:23, 5 January 2009 |action1link=Talk:Battle of Grand Port/GA1 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=262131965 |action2=WAR |action2date=13:21, 26 January 2009 |action2link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Battle of Grand Port |action2result=approved |action2oldid=266165626 |action3=GTC |action3date=19:30, 28 February 2009 |action3link=Wikipedia:Featured topic candidates/Mauritius campaign of 1809–1811 |action3result=promoted |action3oldid=272024004 |action4=WPR |action4date=10 August 2009 |action4link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Peer review/Battle of Grand Port |action4result=reviewed |action4oldid=307067635 |action5=FAC |action5date=16:29, 13 September 2009 |action5link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Battle of Grand Port/archive1 |action5result=promoted |action5oldid=313409171 |ftname=Mauritius campaign of 1809–1811 |topic=war |currentstatus=FA |maindate=20 August 2015 }} {{WikiProject banner shell|1= {{WPMILHIST |class=FA |A-Class=pass |B-Class-1=yes |B-Class-2=yes |B-Class-3=yes |B-Class-4=yes |B-Class-5=yes |old-peer-review=yes |Napoleonic=yes|British=yes|French=yes|Maritime=yes }} {{WikiProject Africa|class=FA|importance=high|Mauritius=yes|Mauritius-importance=top}} {{WikiProject France|class=FA|importance=low}} {{WPUK|class=FA|importance=top}} {{WikiProject British Empire}} }} {{OnThisDay|date1=2011-08-27|oldid1=447017700|date2=2014-08-27|oldid2=622850580|date3=2015-08-27|oldid3=678073524}} == Comment == As a courtesy I am leaving a notice that I am preparing a new, expanded and sourced version of this article in my Userspace (using the current page as a basis). It should be pasted up here in a week or two. If anyone has any comments then by all means drop me a line.--[[User:Jackyd101|Jackyd101]] ([[User talk:Jackyd101|talk]]) 20:32, 30 November 2008 (UTC) :: I removed this link which I don't think is that useful but I case any one wants it, its available here. {{fr}} [http://difjean.club.fr/Voyages/Reunion/Textes/Combat.html La chute des Mascareignes]--[[User:Jackyd101|Jackyd101]] ([[User talk:Jackyd101|talk]]) 18:05, 11 December 2008 (UTC) ::::I have finished my new version and imported the text. If anyone wants to see the article history of its development process, it is at [[User:Jackyd101/Battle of Grand Port]]. Any questions or comments are welcome.--[[User:Jackyd101|Jackyd101]] ([[User talk:Jackyd101|talk]]) 18:15, 11 December 2008 (UTC) Excellent article. And nice use of illustrations and the map. First read about this battle in a book by the historian Paul Fregosi and have been interested in it since then. Good to see its been given such dedicated treatment on Wikipedia. —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/93.174.8.253|93.174.8.253]] ([[User talk:93.174.8.253|talk]]) 15:20, 6 January 2010 (UTC) == Fictional version == A slightly fictionalized version of this battle, with most of the details at least roughly accurate, appears in the novel [[The Mauritius Command]] by [[Patrick O'Brian]]. It seems to me that this fact is worth a brief mention in the article. [[User:DESiegel|DES]] [[User talk:DESiegel|(talk)]] 11:28, 20 August 2015 (UTC) :It is mentioned, in the Aftermath section--[[User:Jackyd101|Jackyd101]] ([[User talk:Jackyd101|talk]]) 14:49, 20 August 2015 (UTC) ::That sentence now moved to new section In literature. --[[User:Prairieplant|Prairieplant]] ([[User talk:Prairieplant|talk]]) 12:38, 2 September 2015 (UTC)
